title: vBulletin and WordPress Bridge vbsocial
description:
Product Description
vBulletin and WordPress make an epic team together. Most professional developers use WordPress as the CMS platform and vBulletin as the forum platform when building their authority sites. The combination of the two allows for full power with the latest technologies. Now add in a WordPress to vBulletin bridge, and the two
softwares can now share a userbase, avatars, and all the great features they both have to offer.
This product is a hassle free,  installation and configuration of vBSSO. Many issues arise when setting up and creating a bridge between WordPress and vBulletin. You must include your FTP, admincp, and wordpress wp-admin details in order to expedite this process.
Please allow a minimum of 48 hours to complete bridge services after purchase

Install:
1.) Put the wp-vb folder in your plugins directory.
2.) Enter the path to your forum on the settings page.
3.) Sync users with the submit button under Sync Wordpress and vBulletin users.
4.) If you want the vB->WP syncing, click the button to add the vB plugins.
5.) Enable the features you want.
6.) Enjoy!
